@\_jrivero_ I just tried confirming your bullet points:

* I see shadows with the current `gazebo6` debs on trusty that  link against `libogre-1.8.0`

* However, I just built gazebo's default branch ([revision 17d3a2b18de36](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/commits/17d3a2b18de364889bba3d885b7ad410aa917cec)) from source on the `osrf` machine against the `libogre3d-1.9-dev` package, and I don't see shadows at all.

* I didn't bother testing the 3rd option.

It seems to me that the problem is with the `libogre3d-1.9-dev` package.

  • However, I just built gazebo's default branch (revision 17d3a2b18de36) from source on the osrf machine against the libogre3d-1.9-dev package, and I don't see shadows at all.

  • I didn't bother testing the 3rd option.

It seems to me that the problem is with the libogre3d-1.9-dev package.
